GowrishankarSMenon/PersonalBlog.summary: Recent activities on PersonalBlog involve UI improvements with changes made to the commit folder, UI endpoints, and server architecture, with the primary focus on enhancing user interface elements.

GowrishankarSMenon/simpleLottery.summary: The simpleLottery repository experienced a single activity, which included updating the README.md file to provide additional information about the project.

profile_summary: As a seasoned software developer with expertise in building scalable and efficient solutions, I have honed my skills in C++, Kotlin, and JavaScript. With over 17 public repositories, I have consistently demonstrated my passion for writing clean, modular code that excels in problem-solving. I have also had the opportunity to collaborate with 1+ developers, shaping my understanding of software development best practices and enabling me to leverage collective knowledge in my projects.
